extra.enrollment_requirement:
PREREQ: APSC 111 and APSC 112 and registered in BSCE.
EXCLUSIONS: PHYS 242 and ENPH 342 and PHYS 342

basic.description: Evidence for relativistic effects. Kinematics and dynamics in special relativity, space-time diagrams, applications. Evidence for quanta, spectra, Bohr atom. Introduction to the Schroedinger equation.
basic.subject: ENPH
basic.title: Relativity And Quanta
